txt.en: 'There are things to be done, but instead of doing them, we wait! Why do we wait?'
'Ah, Barazinbar, Zirak-zigil and Bundushath√ªr! Am I fated to see you soon?'
'Very cold are the springs that run from this mountain.'
'I have asked to accompany the halflings on the quest, but there is work to do here in the mountains first.'
